Companies with Entry Level Jobs and Internships in Bilingual You can also work abroad, doing whatever interests you in that country’s native language. You’ll need a bachelor’s degree in a field related to your interest in addition to second language proficiency. International affairs Law enforcement Public health or service Foreign language teacher Bilingual customer support representative Translator or interpreter Do you speak a second language fluently?
